channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The stock market gained 2% during Biden’s first 60 days. Under Trump the market has tanked 7%
item.description: The S&P 500, Nasdaq, Dow Jones have all plummeted since President Donald Trump took office in January.

item.title: In North Macedonia, Officials Investigate Lapses in Deadly Nightclub Fire
item.description: At least 59 people died and more than 150 were injured in the inferno. The authorities said the venue’s hospitality permit had been issued illegally.

item.title: Want Cheap Power, Fast? Solar and Wind Firms Have a Suggestion.
item.description: Renewable energy companies are shifting strategy under President Trump, emphasizing the economic benefits of low-carbon electricity.

item.title: Robinhood launches prediction market with March Madness, Fed rates as first offerings
item.description: The move underscores Robinhood's push into the fast-growing field of prediction markets.

item.title: Kremlin Stays Mum on Agenda for Putin’s Call With Trump
item.description: The call, scheduled for Tuesday, will be the first known conversation between the two leaders since Mr. Putin laid out numerous conditions for a cease...

item.title: Severe Storms Killed At Least 40 in 7 U.S. States. Here’s What to Know.
item.description: The tornadoes, dust storms and wind-fanned wildfires have led to at least 40 deaths across the United States this past week.

item.title: How Ukraine’s Offensive in Russia’s Kursk Region Unraveled
item.description: At the height of the campaign, Ukrainian forces controlled some 500 square miles of Russian territory. Now they hold just a small sliver of land along...

item.title: Conan O’Brien to Host the Oscars Next Year, Too
item.description: Mr. O’Brien received high marks for his work as the emcee of the 97th Oscar telecast this month. It was his first time hosting the show.

item.title: Teslas are getting torched in Berlin as surveys show Germans are deserting Elon Musk’s carmaker in droves
item.description: Surveys conducted by Caliber and T-Online both show a sharp drop in favorability for Tesla among Germans.

item.title: Gwyneth Paltrow is taking Goop back to basics—and says her best source of business advice is her ‘Fight Club’ group chat of female CEOs

item.description: Firings and buyouts hit the top-secret National Nuclear Security Administration amid a major effort to upgrade America’s nuclear arsenal. Critics say ...

item.title: Gwyneth Paltrow is ready to take 17-year-old Goop into its next era
The Women Most Affected by Abortion Bans
item.description: After the Dobbs decision, births rose in states with bans, but more for some women than others.

item.title: Legal Experts Question Trump’s Authority to Cancel Columbia’s Funding
item.description: The government has demanded drastic changes to the university before it will consider reinstating $400 million. Lee C. Bollinger, the school’s former ...

item.title: Telegram’s Pavel Durov, Charged With Range of Crimes, Is Allowed to Leave France
item.description: Pavel Durov said that the investigation into illicit activity on the messaging app he runs is ongoing, but that he had returned home to Dubai.
